page.title: 07PAPER-MAKING IN STUBBINS
page.content: There are two forms of paper-making taking place in our area.{Fort {Sterling }make tissue paper in bulk and{Two Rivers Paper Company produce good quality hand-made paper. {Fort Sterling}used to be called Sterling Stubbins until an American company took it over.They get waste paper from all over Britain,and they recycle it to make tissue paper.The paper is mashed and put into a mesh sleeve so the water will drain off,and the resulting sheet is rolled and turned into tissue paper. { The Two Rivers Paper Company}produce hand_made paper from wood pulp.Artists use it for watercolours and sketching. To give the paper extra strength it is dried then stretched,then wet again and finally loft dried.It is very expensive and is used by artists from all over Britain.
